name: Fox Gun
description:
Bounty hunter Fox Gun takes on a criminal circle after purposely being captured unarmed.

Enjoy this short game I made in two days. uuuu

It has two bosses.

CONTROLS

Fullscreen - P

Exit Fullscreen - Q
